fields.title: Welcome Back!
fields.description: We are excited to welcome everyone back for the new school year!

fields.title: Parent-Teacher Conference
fields.description: Parent-teacher conferences will be held next week. Please check your emails for details.

fields.title: Job Opportunities
fields.description: We are currently seeking candidates for various teaching positions. Visit our website for more information.

fields.title: Upcoming Field Trip
fields.description: Our next field trip is scheduled for next month. Don't forget to submit your permission slips!

fields.title: School Carnival
fields.description: Join us for our annual school carnival on October 28th. Fun activities for the whole family!
